query:
UPDATE assessments 
SET uniformatId = (SELECT id FROM building_components WHERE code = 'D40' LIMIT 1),
    uniformatLevel = (SELECT level FROM building_components WHERE code = 'D40' LIMIT 1),
    uniformatGroup = 'D'
WHERE componentCode = 'D40' AND uniformatId IS NULL;
